text: Massimo Rosa (born 9 December 1995 in Alba) is an Italian cyclist, who currently rides for mountain bike racing team Giant–Liv Polimedical. He is the younger brother of fellow professional cyclist, Diego Rosa. ==Major results== ;2017 : 1st Mountains classification Giro della Valle d'Aosta : 3rd G.P. Palio del Recioto ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists
title: Massimo Rosa
